svcsubproc.title: Fuel Fill
svcsubproc.para: The bus fuel fill is located on the curb side of the vehicle unless optional tanks are required and installed. The fuel fill location on side mounted fuel tanks is generally located behind the passenger side entry door. Rear mounted between the frame rail fuel tanks have the fuel fill door at the rear of the bus body behind of the rear axle. The fuel door has a positive latching device to secure the door. An optional locking door is available. The entire fuel fill access door assembly can be removed.

step1.para: Locate the six mounting screws that secure the fuel fill door assembly to the body side panel.

figure.caption: Figure 108. Fuel Fill Door Panel Removal

step1.para: Loosen and remove the mounting screws and remove fuel fill door assembly.
